Please log in or register with your social account Two choir boys set to sing at Prince Harry and Meghan Markle ’ s wedding have branded the experience ahead of them as a “ once in a lifetime opportunity ”. Leo Mill, 11, and Nathan Mcharo, nine, told how they were “ super excited ” to perform in front of a global television audience of millions. The pair are among 12 young choristers who will sing in the Choir of St George ’ s Chapel at the royal wedding on Saturday. Leo said of first joining choir : ` ` I knew that we sang for the Queen every Easter and other occasions but I didn't
